alfredsnippet.snippet:
# color image to gray image
apt install imagemagick
convert source.jpg -colorspace gray destination.jpg

# video to image
# interval: one second.
ffmpeg -i INPUT.MKV -r 1 -f image2 ./%4d.jpeg
ffmpeg -i INPUT.MKV -r 1 -vf scale=640x360 ./%04d.png

# concat
ffmpeg -f concat -i inputs.txt -c copy output.mp4
# with:
# inputs.txt =
# file '/path/to/input1.mp4'
# file '/path/to/input2.mp4'
# file '/path/to/input3.mp4'

# flac to wav
ffmpeg -i input.flac output.wav

# resample
ffmpeg -i file1.wav -ar 44100 file1-enc.wav

# split channel
# for wav file, audio channel should be named as 0.0.0, 0.0.1 ...
ffmpeg -i multichan.wav -map_channel 0.0.0 chan0.wav
ffmpeg -i multichan.wav -map_channel 0.0.1 chan1.wav
# or
ffmpeg -i multichan.wav -map_channel 0.0.0 chan0.wav -map_channel 0.0.1 chan1.wav
alfredsnippet.name: multi media convert
